text:
Where "jr" is the prefix of a custom tag library and 'if' is a tag in that
library, Jasper seems to convert the following tag

<jr:if test='<%= "foo" %>'>

incorrectly into the following fragment:

<jr:if
  test="%= "foo" %"
>

The quotation marks (") need to be quoted.

A fix could be to replace line 184 of
jasper/src/share/org/apache/jasper/compilerJspUtil.java 
with

    returnString = escapeXml(expression.substring (1, length - 1));

but I haven't fully thought through spec compliance in this regard,
so I figured I'd submit that here instead of sending in an actual
patch.

Regards,

Shawn

In the converted XML, quotes in expressions are now escaped. Fixed in Tomcat
4.0.
